netcal.binning¶

Binning methods for confidence calibration. This package consists of several methods for confidence calibration which use binning to approximate confidence estimates to the measured accuracy.

Available classes¶

HistogramBinning([bins, equal_intervals, …])

Simple Histogram Binning calibration method.

IsotonicRegression([detection, …])

Isotonic Regression method.

BBQ([score_function, detection, …])

Bayesian Binning into Quantiles (BBQ).

ENIR([score_function, quick_init, …])

Ensemble of Near Isotonic Regression (ENIR) models.
